subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Derr reported from the Masters 62 times starting in 1935, the year after it began, and was part of the CBS team that first presented the event on television, in 1956.
snippet: Mr. Derr reported from the Masters 62 times starting in 1935, the year after it began, and was part of the CBS team that first presented the event on television, in 1956.
